ModMetaData.name: Biomes! Fossils
ModMetaData.author: The Biomes Mod Team
ModMetaData.description:
Adds dinosaur and other related fossils. Dig up fossil and amber, restore and reconstruct huge skeletons and other fossils, and display them in beautiful museums! Pawns can wander around museums as a joy activity. Children can visit museums as a learning activity.
Safe to add, not safe to remove. Requires Harmony.
